title: Add javadocs for Solr AuthorizationPlugin framework
description:
The Solr AuthorizationPlugin interface and associated classes don't have proper javadocs. This makes it hard for the developers building 3rd party plugins to understand the contract without scanning the Solr codebase.

This jira is to improve the java-docs for Solr authorization framework.

comments.content: +1, much needed. Perhaps the same for authentication framework as well?
comments.author: Ishan Chattopadhyaya
